name: Riviera Resources, Inc.
description: Riviera Resources, Inc. is a dynamic company focused on the acquisition, development, and production of oil and natural gas assets in the United States. Founded in 2018, Riviera was formed as a result of a spin-off from the larger entity, creating a company with a streamlined portfolio of assets and a dedicated management team. The company primarily operates in the Mid-Continent region, with significant holdings in Oklahoma and Texas, where it engages in the exploration and extraction of hydrocarbons. Riviera Resources aims to create value by leveraging its operational expertise and strategic acquisitions to optimize production and enhance profitability. The company is committed to responsible energy production and emphasizes environmental stewardship in its operations, ensuring compliance with industry regulations while minimizing ecological impact. With a focus on innovation and efficiency, Riviera Resources strives to implement advanced technologies and practices to improve operational performance and drive sustainable growth in the energy sector.
